name: Get an assist in a goal (Four-on-Four Football)
Score 200 or higher (Bowling)
Win a round with only thrust attacks (Chambara)
Complete any tutorial
Score with a curved kick (Football)
Score an Eagle or better (Golf)
Win a match without conceding a goal (Four-on-Four Football)
Complete a hole with a par or better, redlining every shot (excludes putting, Golf)
Score 150 or higher without moving or angling (Bowling)
Beat a Powerhouse CPU or higher (Chambara)
Complete a 3 Hole Random Game (Golf)
Win by KO in under 30 seconds (One-on-One Football)
Hit the larger fountain on Hole 11 [unique sfx plays], then complete the hole without reaching the stroke limit (Golf)
Beat the Football (One-on-One) Mii Legend
Sink a putt from outside the green (Golf)
Win against a powerhouse CPU or higher, controlling two characters individually (Tennis)
Win with the Charge Sword without using a Charge Strike (Chambara)
Win 5-0 (Volleyball)
Score 50 in the Staff Credits minigame
Return a ‘Smash’ successfully (Tennis)
Shoot and score from your own half of the pitch against a strong CPU or higher (Football)
Win a round, attacking less than three times (No Sudden Death, Chambara)
Win a point with a ‘Quick Spike’ (Volleyball)
Come back from 0-4 behind to win 7-6 against a strong CPU or higher (Badminton)
Hit the Flag (Golf)
